hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp s3://avillach-datastage-pic-sure-jenkins-dev-builds-3/releases/jenkins_pipeline_build_${pipeline_build_id}/pic-sure-api.tar.gz pic-sure-api.tar.gz aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp s3://avillach-datastage-pic-sure-jenkins-dev-builds-3/releases/jenkins_pipeline_build_${pipeline_build_id}/pic-sure-auth-microapp.tar.gz pic-sure-auth-microapp.tar.gz PIC_SURE_API_VERSION=`docker load -i pic-sure-api.tar.gz|cut -d ':' -f 3` PIC_SURE_AUTH_VERSION=`docker load -i pic-sure-auth-microapp.tar.gz|cut -d ':' -f 3`
echo $PIC_SURE_API_VERSION echo $PIC_SURE_AUTH_VERSION
docker build --build-arg PIC_SURE_API_VERSION=$PIC_SURE_API_VERSION --build-arg PIC_SURE_AUTH_VERSION=$PIC_SURE_AUTH_VERSION -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-wildfly:${pipeline_build_id} . docker save hms-dbmi/pic-sure-wildfly:${pipeline_build_id} > pic-sure-wildfly.tar.gz aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp pic-sure-wildfly.tar.gz s3://avillach-datastage-pic-sure-jenkins-dev-builds-3/releases/jenkins_pipeline_build_${pipeline_build_id}/pic-sure-wildfly.tar.gz
